text: William Bridgeman may refer to: * William Bridgeman, 1st Viscount Bridgeman (1864–1935), British Conservative politician *William Bridgeman (MP for Bramber) (c. 1646-1699), English civil servant and MP *Bill Bridgeman (1916-1968), American test pilot *Billy Bridgeman (1884-1947), English footballer
title: William Bridgeman
